item.title: Testing CockroachDB
item.description: 1. Baseline Single Start a standalone Cockroach database server Load the database with keys Run a sequence of YCSB workloads in the following order (A,B, C,F, D, E) Observations Nothing strange 2. Baseline Cluster Deterministic Start a set of individual Cockroach servers Combine the individual servers into a Cockroach cluster. Run a sequence of YCSB workloads (A,B, C,F, D, E), sending traffic to masters-0 Observations If we run the load with 400 threads then the entire system blocks after 66.

item.title: Testing Flower
item.description: 1. Baseline Start server Download the dataset into a shared volume that will be shared with the clients. Start 2 clients History (~4m) Loss Distributed round 1 1.9984407424926758 round 2 1.677626609802246 round 3 1.5497934818267822 Observations ... Metrics Average CPU Usage Page faults Accessed Sectors Network Throughput 2. Throttled Server Start 1 Flower server low on resources (1 vCPU) Download the dataset into a shared volume that will be shared with the clients.
